attributes.action: support the idea of  a Pro Network Neutrality Internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Network neutrality is the principle that Internet users should be in control of what content they view and what applications they use on the Internet. 
Fundamentally, net neutrality is about equal access to the Internet.

British ISPs should not be allowed to breach Network Neutrality by limiting their users access to only certain websites, for their financial gain.

This includes actions such as impeding the speed or firewalling to a certain site or online service such as an Instant Messaging program or Voice Chatting program.

Dismantling Network Neutrality would be morally apprehensible, it would allow ISPs to monopolise the internet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
